alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 5:12PM CST until December 09 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northeastern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 512 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Lincoln, or 12 miles southwest of Brookhaven, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brookhaven, Vaughn, and Loyd Star around 520 PM CST. Wesson and Beauregard around 540 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central, south central and southwestern Mississippi.
